channel.title: +0 on आगमे ब्राह्मे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +0 on आगमे ब्राह्मे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Intro
item.description: p. ix INTRODUCTION. In the Introduction to the first volume of the translation of the ‘Vedānta-Sūtras with Śankara’s Commentary’ (vol. xxxiv of this Series) I have dwelt at some length on the interest which Rāmānuja’s Commentary may claim–as being, on the one hand, the fullest exposition of what may be called the Theistic Vedānta, and as supplying us, on the other, with means of penetrating to the true meaning of Bādarāyaṇa’s Aphorisms.
